author: John Sacco
text:
How would ICMA define flexible budgets? I have 1) low and high options 2) working within constraints such as entitlements and unfunded mandates 3) volume variance and break even point. I'm writing a proposal for a symposium for public finance and management and would like to get input from ICMA. Once the proposal is done I would send it to ICMA for authors
-Prof. Sacco
George Mason University
Fairfax va
